Golf Events
Golf Events
Choose your club carefully
.
It may be the most significant factor in the success of your next event. And selecting the perfect location to host a golf tournament has never been this easy. Rest assured the staff and amenities at Horseshoe Bay Golf Club combine to deliver an extraordinary experience for corporate and charitable golf outings alike. When it comes time to hosting your clients, employees or sponsors, our venue offers an impressive setting to thrill and entertain.
Since Horseshoe Bay’s opening in 2000, we have strived to be set the standard for Private Clubs in Wisconsin with our Golf Events, Service, and Experience.  We are situated just south of the beautiful township of Egg Harbor, offering a unique retreat from your typical city course.  Horseshoe Bay offers breathtaking scenery and exclusive views of Door County. Our stunning Golf course features dramatic elevation changes and rolling terrain, unexpected in a location so close to town. This creates a challenging yet enjoyable experience for participants of all skill levels.  The level of service we provide to our Golf outings is unparalleled, and creates a memorable experience for every player. Horseshoe Bay’s golf amenities include a beautiful practice green, driving range, and a short game pitching area.
With many years of experience the PGA Professional Staff of Horseshoe Bay will work diligently on making your tournament first class and memorable.
If you would like more information on hosting an event at Horseshoe Bay, please contact Jamie Christianson, PGA Head Golf Professional, at 920-868-4461 or by email at
[email protected]

Event Inquiry
Golf Outings
Venues
Photo Gallery
Weddings & Events
Weddings
Our Beach Club offers a picturesque destination, myriad gourmet dinner options, and an indoor or outdoor space that can fit to host any and every one of your wedding events is what awaits those who choose to spend their special day with Horseshoe Bay Golf Club.
Our Beach Club offers an indoor dining room for smaller venues which can provide perfect options for an intimate wedding celebration or additional events like engagement parties, rehearsal dinners, welcome drinks and farewell brunches.  The expansive shore front outdoor area offers unlimited possibilities for any size reception or ceremony event.
No matter the details, at Horseshoe Bay Golf Club we understand this is the most important day of your life, we pride ourselves in offering a setting and service as special as the sunset and water that surround us.
Special Events
In addition to weddings, we’re also happy to accommodate and help you plan other celebrations and events for family and friends. Our space at the Beach Club and customizable menu options are great options for retirement parties, milestone birthday celebrations, reunions and fundraisers.
For more information, or to plan your wedding at Horseshoe Bay Golf Club please contact, Carrie Baldwin Smith, Owner Door County Event Planners, for other Horseshoe Bay Golf Club events please contact Bree Kotwitz, Catering & Events Manager with your inquiries today:
Carrie Baldwin Smith

Meet the Management
About Us
Welcome to Horseshoe Bay Golf Club. Built on some of the most scenic, fertile and ruggedly
beautiful land the Great Lakes has to offer, our club is home to a championship golf course,
family friendly dining, and a host of recreational amenities. Please feel free to explore and
learn more about who we are and where we’ve been.

Membership Summary
At this time, all membership categories have reached their membership capacity and we have moved into a waiting list scenario, including our Social Memberships.  For wait list options and restrictions please reach out to Carrie Becker, Membership Manager today at 920-868-4116 or by email at
[email protected]
.
Horseshoe Bay Golf Club offers four levels of full membership designed to meet the varying needs of its members.  A Golf membership is ideal for the full-time seasonal resident or avid golfer or golfing family, while a Sport membership is tailored to those individuals who can only spend a limited amount of time in Door County each year, both offer unlimited access to the club facilities and amenities.  Our Young Professional Membership is available to those under the age of 40 who wish to have full golf and social privileges within the club.  A Social membership allows individuals to take advantage of the amenities.
This one-of-a-kind private club offers opportunities no matter who you are or how much time you spend in Door County, Wisconsin.  So come be a part of Horseshoe Bay Golf Club, we've been waiting for you.
MEMBERSHIP APPLICATION
Membership Categories
GOLF
YOUNG PROFESSIONAL
SPORT
SOCIAL
Privileges and Benefits
Unlimited golf, club open 6 days per week, walking privileges.
Advance AM Tee Time Privileges.  Golf members may make AM or PM tee time reservations up to thirty days in advance.
Use of the Member's Clubhouse, including all restaurant facilities, fitness center, and beach club.
Golf Shop merchandise buying program
Club charge account
Reduced green fees for invited guests
Free use of Range and Practice Facility
Unlimited access to club social events
Three complimentary guest passes including cart per year
25% discount on club/speed cart storage and/or locker rental
Spouse/significant other of a single golf member is extended social privileges

Member Pricing Program is a non-elective program which provides you with at least a 40% discount off our retail pricing on soft goods and hard good pricing are 10% over cost.
The Young Professional Program is offered for a maximum of 7 seasons to anyone 40 years old or younger who wishes to hold a family membership with full golfing privileges.  From the time of joining until reaching the age of 41 or after completing 7 seasons, whichever arrives first, these members will receive at least a 50% discount on yearly dues along with a discounted joining fee payable over two years.  Level I is offered to anyone age 18 through 36, and Level II is offered to anyone age 37 through 40.  At the time of membership transition due to age or season limitations, the Young Professionals Member will be responsible for 50% of the difference between the then going Initiation Fee of the Young Professional Level II Membership and the Golf or Sport Membership level they wish to move too.
Privileges and Benefits of Young Professional Membership
Unlimited golf, club open 7 days per week, walking privileges.
Advance AM Tee Time Privileges.  Young Professional members may make AM tee time reservations up to fourteen days in advance and PM tee time reservations up to thirty days in advance.
Use of the Member's Clubhouse, including all restaurant facilities, fitness center, and beach club.
Golf Shop merchandise buying program
Club charge account
Reduced green fees for invited guests
Free use of Range and Practice Facility
Unlimited access to club social events

Privileges and Benefits
Unlimited golf, club open 7 days per week, walking privileges.  Sport members may play ten 18-hole rounds by paying the privileged playing fee.  Any round after the 10 will incur a $200 fee.
Advance AM Tee Time Privileges.  Sport members may make AM tee time reservations up to ten days in advance and PM tee times thirty days in advance.

Membership Promotions
Young Professional Membership
We offer a Young Professional Membership to any new member age 40 or younger who wishes to hold a membership with full golfing privileges. The 2025 dues are $4,775 and the joining fee is $7,500 for those up to age 36 and $10,000 for those age 37-40. All other Young Pro membership fees, minimums and privileges apply.
For more information, to learn about our wait list options, or to request a tour next time you are in Door County, Wisconsin contact:
Carrie Becker, Membership Manager
920-868-4116 or 877-599-4653 ext 1202
